alert.note: Alert for Mayes (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 11 at 8:38PM CDT until August 11 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR DELAWARE...EASTERN MAYES...NORTHWESTERN ADAIR AND NORTHEASTERN CHEROKEE COUNTIES... At 837 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Disney to 5 miles southeast of Spavinaw to 4 miles south of Rose, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Siloam Springs... Jay... Locust Grove... Salina... West Siloam Springs... Langley... Colcord... Kansas... Spavinaw... Watts... Disney... Oaks... Pensacola... Hoot Owl... Cherokee State Park... Rose... Leach... Chloeta... Twin Oaks... Maysville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
